name: Open Book
components: V, S, M (a page torn from a book)
text: You lay bare not only the mind of a target, but the target’s history as well. The target takes a –2 penalty on saving throws against divinations, and Diplomacy checks to gather information about the target gain a bonus equal to half your caster level (maximum +10).
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（从书上扯下的1张书页）
text_zh: 你不但要揭露目标的思想，还要将它的过去公之于众。目标会在对抗预言系法术（divinations）的豁免检定中承受-2减值，而且在使用交涉检定搜集关于目标的信息时会获得加值，数值等同于你的施法者等级的一半（最高+10点）。
